body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EDr-zswlq3OJbUCGmIjvCpKndm3LF-k8ArDe0*KSHQpVBJCgRELSQ1OuaL*oVM-xC39Qm*XZt2TCr**GBv95WbdxBIm1aw1G/HoneyBeeError.png)Hi all. I am a newbie to this and I'm trying to run a simple daylight study on an irregularly shaped floorplate and keep getting the following error: 'Solution Exception;'EPZone' object has no attribute 'cenPt' Any thoughts on how to fix this? Thanks in advance!
topic: Honey Bee daylight error "object has no cenPt"
